ComicInfo.Summary:
Too Hot To Handle: Blazer’s powers are becoming unstable, requiring her to focus more on controlling them through concentration. The Rebellion’s plan of getting Tana to join them hit’s a snag, when she has a waking nightmare that reverts her to a catatonic state. Georwell’s invasion of Earth splits Earth’s forces: Blazer and Havoc go to Washington D.C. while Controller, Nightowl, and Youthquake journey to Britain.
Balance of Power: As a new power envelops the boys, Ragna wants to kill the traitors. But Ramman understands the truth of Georwell and Zarren. The boys then disappear after Ramman shares his new understanding with Diviner.
ComicInfo.Title: Too Hot To Handle; Balance of Power
ComicInfo.Characters: Crusader],Tarot (Tana’s father in flashback),Carolyn Smith,Talisman,Feral,Demon,Fist,Douglas Hamilton,Titan,Darkforce,Killgore,Maxinor,Havoc,Tana,The new Justice Machine [Monolith,the Free Force [Controller,Id,Pixel,Youthquake,Nightowl],Man-Slaughter,Phaser,Blazer,Night Lightning
